original_title: Expedition: Bigfoot - Are We Ready For The Truth?
overview: For decades David and Malinda Bakara have searched for the legendary cryptid known as Bigfoot. And they're not alone. In 2016 the Bakaras opened Expedition: Bigfoot! -- a one-of-a-kind repository of all things Sasquatch. We visited Mr. Bakara to learn more about his experiences, his convictions, and why he believes there's overwhelming evidence for this creature's existence.
title: Expedition: Bigfoot - Are We Ready For The Truth?
